name: part_017
file: tmp_【#つながるホロライブDAY2】hololive 3rd fes. Link Your Wish【チラ見せ】 [LgyXzn0k0MA]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_017.mov

scenes.description: Nakiri Ayame performs her original song 'Yoi no Yoi'.
Nakiri Ayame finishes her performance as the stage transitions.
An introduction video plays for the next performing group: Ookami Mio, Usada Pekora, Tsunomaki Watame, and Shishiro Botan.
Ookami Mio, Usada Pekora, Tsunomaki Watame, and Shishiro Botan perform 'Animal'.

subtitles.original: よいよいよいよいよい...
subtitles.english: Yoi yoi yoi yoi yoi...

subtitles.original: オッケー！
subtitles.english: Okay!

subtitles.original: せーせーのよいよいよい
subtitles.english: Se-se-no-yoi-yoi-yoi

subtitles.original: 振り乱す
subtitles.english: Shake it all about

subtitles.original: せーせーのよいよいよい
subtitles.english: Se-se-no-yoi-yoi-yoi

subtitles.original: 天を埋め尽くせ
subtitles.english: Fill up the entire sky

subtitles.original: 唄え 踊れ 右輪で
subtitles.english: Sing and dance by the water's edge

subtitles.original: いきよいよい 愉快 千代の宴
subtitles.english: With great vigor, a joyful eternal feast

subtitles.original: さぁさぁ騒げ よろず前
subtitles.english: Now, now, make some noise before everything

subtitles.original: 可憐な鬼は内へ
subtitles.english: The lovely oni comes inside

subtitles.original: 唄え 踊れ 舞え 倣え
subtitles.english: Sing, dance, perform, and follow along

subtitles.original: ほう 骨の髄まで愛嬌
subtitles.english: Oh, charming to the very marrow

subtitles.original: さぁさぁ騒げ 暁まで
subtitles.english: Now, now, make some noise until dawn

subtitles.original: 可憐な鬼は内へ
subtitles.english: The lovely oni comes inside

subtitles.original: 理屈も無い事態 難題も手負う
subtitles.english: In this illogical situation, facing even great challenges

subtitles.original: 音に乗せられて
subtitles.english: Carried away by the sound

subtitles.original: 何てったって今派手に舞え
subtitles.english: Because after all, perform flamboyantly now

subtitles.original: 千真爛漫 よいのよいのよい
subtitles.english: Pure and bright, yoi no yoi no yoi

subtitles.original: 大神ミオ / OOKAMI MIO
subtitles.english: Ookami Mio

subtitles.original: 兎田ぺこら / USADA PEKORA
subtitles.english: Usada Pekora

subtitles.original: 角巻わため / TSUNOMAKI WATAME
subtitles.english: Tsunomaki Watame

subtitles.original: 獅白ぼたん / SHISHIRO BOTAN
subtitles.english: Shishiro Botan

subtitles.original: 明日の天気だとか
subtitles.english: Whether it's tomorrow's weather

subtitles.original: 流行りのものも全部
subtitles.english: Or even all the latest trends

subtitles.original: あなたが今知りたいこと
subtitles.english: Everything you want to know right now

subtitles.original: あたしが皆教えるから
subtitles.english: I'll tell you all about it

subtitles.original: でもあなたが何を知りたいのか
subtitles.english: But as for what it is you want to know

subtitles.original: あたしは分からないんだよ
subtitles.english: I really don't have a clue

subtitles.original: 三命学でも占星術でも
subtitles.english: Whether by Sanmeigaku or astrology

subtitles.original: タロット占いでもあたしたちの相性
subtitles.english: Or even by tarot, our compatibility

subtitles.original: 最悪だけど
subtitles.english: Is the absolute worst

subtitles.original: 動物占いならあたしたちは
subtitles.english: But according to animal fortune-telling

subtitles.original: 相性抜群のカップルだって
subtitles.english: We're a perfectly compatible couple

subtitles.original: ねぇ こっち向いてよ
subtitles.english: Hey, look this way

subtitles.original: 占いによりますと
subtitles.english: According to the fortune-telling

subtitles.original: あなたの悩み事は
subtitles.english: As for your worries

subtitles.original: あたしに全て話すことで
subtitles.english: By telling me everything

subtitles.original: 身体ごと消えるのです
subtitles.english: They'll disappear along with your body

subtitles.original: でもあなたが何に悩んでいるのか
subtitles.english: But as for what it is you're worrying about

subtitles.original: あたしは分からないんだよ
subtitles.english: I really don't have a clue

subtitles.original: あたしはコアラで策略家だけど
subtitles.english: I'm a Koala and a tactician

subtitles.original: あなたの知らないところ多すぎて
subtitles.english: But there's too much I don't know about you

subtitles.original: ちょっと困ってるんだよ
subtitles.english: I'm a little troubled by it

subtitles.original: あなたは黒豹黙っていたって
subtitles.english: You're a Black Panther, even if you stay quiet

subtitles.original: いいところなら何だって知ってるよ
subtitles.english: I know everything about your good points

subtitles.original: ねぇ 伝えさせてよ
subtitles.english: Hey, let me tell you
